vialab.simpleMultiTouch

Class ImageZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.Zone
      • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.RectZone
        • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.ImageZone

  • public class ImageZone
extends RectZone
    This is a rectangular zone which displays an image.

    University of Ontario Institute of Technology. Summer Research Assistant with Dr. Christopher Collins (Summer 2011) collaborating with Dr. Mark Hancock.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik Paluka

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageZone

        public ImageZone(processing.core.PImage img,
         int x,
         int y,
         int width,
         int height)
        ImageZone constructor, creates a rectangular zone and draws a PImage to it.
        Parameters:
        img - PImage - The PImage that will be drawn to the zone's coordinates.
        x - int - X-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        y - int - Y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        width - int - Width of the zone
        height - int - Height of the zone

      • ImageZone

        public ImageZone(processing.core.PImage img,
         int x,
         int y)
        ImageZone constructor. Creates a rectangular zone and draws a PImage to it. The width and height of the zone is set to the PImage's width and height.
        Parameters:
        img - PImage - The PImage that will be drawn to the zone's coordinates.
        x - int - X-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        y - int - Y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone

      • ImageZone

        public ImageZone(processing.core.PImage[] img,
         int x,
         int y,
         int width,
         int height)
        ImageZone constructor, creates a rectangular zone and draws a PImage to it.
        Parameters:
        img[] - PImage - The PImage[] array that will be drawn to the zone's coordinates.
        x - int - X-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        y - int - Y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        width - int - Width of the zone
        height - int - Height of the zone
